revised_title: Intensive Ruminant Agriculture: Nutrition, Reproduction, and Feed Utilization
tldr: The article discusses the advancements in ruminant animal nutrition and intensive agriculture methods. It highlights the challenges and opportunities in beef and lamb production, focusing on the role of cereal-based diets, reproductive rates, and feed utilization. The author also explores the implications of these advancements on human food production, animal productivity, and natural resource utilization.
